translation.HARD_MODE_ALERT_MESSAGE: Hard Mode can be enabled only at the start!
translation.HARD_MODE_DESCRIPTION: Any revealed hints must be used in subsequent guesses
translation.SHARE_FAILURE_TEXT: Unable to share the results. This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.
translation.MIGRATE_DESCRIPTION_TEXT: Click here to transfer your statistics to a new device.
translation.DISCOURAGE_INAPP_BROWSER_TEXT: You are using an embedded browser and may experience problems sharing or saving your results. We encourage you rather to use your device's default browser.
translation.INSTRUCTION_MIGRATEION: Copy the migration code on your old device and paste into the input on the new device.
translation.CONFIRMATION_MIGRATION: Are you sure you want to override the statistics on this device? This action is not reversable.
